text: Phyllis Piddington (9 October 1910 – 8 July 2001) was an Australian writer. Her book Southern Rainbow was adapted as an anime television series Lucy-May of the Southern Rainbow as part of World Masterpiece Theater series by Nippon Animation. == Notable works == * Southern Rainbow, Oxford University Press, Melbourne, 1982 * "The Old Toll House", poem published in Sunlight and Shadows 2, Fellowship of Australian Writers, 1988 * "Holiday Before War", short story published in Silver Linings, Fellowship of Australian Writers, 1992 ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2001 deaths Category:20th- century Australian writers Category:Australian women poets
title: Phyllis Piddington
